issue.title: Audit of topics to ensure no cheating allowed

content.raw: I agree with @scpeters that only the topics and services published or subscribed by gazebo should be blacklisted. And not all of them, obviously /clock and the srcsim topics are required. I don't believe that anything ihmc topic publishes anything on the simulation that would not be available on the real robot.
